revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: "(Column 41):;Protarchos, son of Leonides grandson of Anchophis, mother Herois, drachmas 8;;Apollonarion, daughter of Teberis (mother of Harpalos, son of Kanis);(in left margin: drachmas 8) orchard taxes for the 12th year apomoira drachma 1, obol 1.5, tax on the produce of olives obol 1.5, chalki 2, naubion obol 0.5, chalki 2, surcharges obls 2;;eparourion drachma 1, obols 4, surcharges obol 1, kollybos obol 0.5, in total drachmas 3, obols 5;;geometria for the 12th year drachmas 3, obol 0.5, chalki 2, surcharges obol 1, chalki 2, in total drachmas 3, obols 2.;Sokmenis, son of Sokrates, grandson of Phasis, mother Tapetheus, drachmas 8;;Euemeros, son of Aunes, grandson of Aunes, mother Tepheros, drachmas 20;;Petheus, son of Petheus, grandson of Petheus, mother Taelekis, ;guard taxes, drachmas 8;;Sarapion alias Sokrates, son of Achillas, grandson of Hatres, mother Tamarron, drachmas 24;;Petermouthis, son of Kastor, grandson of Heraklas, mother Tasoucharion, drachmas 4;;Esouris, son of Kames, grandson of Heras, mother Thaesis, drachmas 8;;Pasoknopaios, son of Phasis, grandson of Esouris, mother Tanomgeus, drachmas 4;;in total for the day drachmas 248, obol 1;;(Pharmouthi) 1 likewise:;Katresis, slave of Thaisarion alias Nebsosis, drachmas 8;;Gaius Sempronius Priscus (son of Kyrtos);;(in left margin: to Sarap() drachmas 76, obols 19) tax on gathered grapes for the 11th year apomoira drachmas 7, obols 3, naubion obols 2, chalki 2, surcharges drachma 1, obols 3.5, chalki 2;;eparourion drachmas 5, surcharges obols 2.5, kollema obol 1.5, in total drachmas 15, obol 1;;orchard taxes for the 11th year apomoira drachmas 6, obols 5, chalki 2, tax on the produce of olives, drachma 1, naubion obols 4.5, surcharges drachma 1, obols 4.5;;eparourion drachmas 4, obols 3.5, surcharges obols 2, chalki 2, kollybos obol 1.5, chalki 2, drachmas 15, obols 3.5, chalki 2;;8 drachma fee of Dionysios drachmas 8, surcharges obols 3, in total drachmas 8, obols 3;;geometria for the 12th year drachmas 35, obols 5.5, chalki 2, surcharges drachmas 2, obol 1.5, in total drachmas 38, obol 1, chalki 2;;Melanas, son of Pakysis, grandson of Pakysis, mother Taeuhemeros, drachmas 24;;Ptolemaios, son of Nestosiris, grandson of Petheus, mother Thermouthis, drachmas 4;;Peteesis, son of Horos (Teleesis);;(in left margin: drachmas 16, obols 21) orchard taxes for the 12th year drachma 1, obols 3.5, tax on the produce of olives obol 1, chalki 2, naubion obol 1, surcharges chalki 2;;eparourion drachma 1, chalki 2, surcharges obol 0.5, kollybos obol 0.5, in total drachmas 3, obols 4;;1/4 of geometria for the 13th year drachma 1, obols 5, chalki 2, surcharges obol 0.5, chalki 2, in total drachmas 2;;naubion for the katoikoi for the 13th year obols 4.5, surcharges obols 0.5, kollybos chalki 2, in total obols 5, chalki 2;;tax on land in release likewise obols 4.5, surcharges obol 1, kollybos chalki 2, in total obols 5.5, chalki 2;;and Taeuhemeros, daughter of Chairemon;;orchard taxes for the 12th year apomoira drachma 1, obols 5, chalki 2, tax on the produce of olives obol 1.5 chalki 2, naubion obol 1, chalki 2, surcharges obols 3;;eparourion drachma 1, obol 1.5, surcharges obol 0.5, chalki 2, kollybos obol 0.5, in total drachmas 4, obols 2;;geometria for the 12th year drachmas 4, obols 4, chalki 2, surcharges obols 2, in total drachmas 5, chalki 2."

listBibl.bibl: Rep Editor - Pearl OM; Rep Ser. - Diss; 1938; pg. 9 - 10 Youtie HC, PMich IV, 1, 224, 1937 Pearl OM - Youtie HC, PMich IV, 357 C, D, 1939
